text: Muslimiiney yusguuden lacak Yallih migaq elle cussuumewee lacih cado makmina, diggah woo lacih cado yakmeenim Yallih amrik awqiyya kinnik, diggah jinni sheytoona seehad√¢ korosuy ken awlaytiitih tanil waswasah ceelalloola Qambisan barugay Yalli Qideh cado matakmaanaay sinnih Qidden lacih cado takmen axcuk sin giddiyaanam keh, muslimiiney Bargi cado calallossaanamal ken amri oggolteenik, toysa diggah isin keninnaah Yallat agleytit haa mara kinniton
